name: RPGPROJECT
description:
This is an RPG game, inspired by the World of Warcraft, one of the greatest games in the world. After experiencing the plot of this game, I feel that 3DRPG is the best way that can make the player have a better immersive experience. There are lots of scenes and maps, lots of talkable NPCs, and lots of different tasks in this world. What could be more exciting than the experience of pushing the story through exploration! Come explore the world! 

I know there are many bugs in this game, please put your suggestions and bug feedback on the message board, thanks!
